SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
NONPROFIT CLOUD
Fundraising

Engage donors, raise funds, and drive outcomes with tools for strategic planning and data-driven insights with Nonprofit Cloud for Fundraising.

Get Started with Fundraising
Fundraising provides tools to engage donors, raise funds, and drive revenue. Gain data-driven insights that can fuel your fundraising strategy for donors of all kinds. Explore a trial org and learn about what's included, the recommended setup, and how to get ready for your implementation.
Learn About Nonprofit Cloud for Fundraising
Nonprofit Cloud for Fundraising, also known as Fundraising, provides new and easy ways to engage donors, raise funds, and drive outcomes with specialized tools and data-driven insights.
Set Up Fundraising
Enable Fundraising, configure user profiles, users, and permissions, and set up key features and automation so users can get started using Fundraising.
Gift Commitments
Use the Fundraising app to manage all types of gift commitments, both monetary and in kind. You can track gifts for particular opportunities and campaigns, change transaction schedules, and update donation amounts. Automated tasks simplify handling recurring donations. You can also easily monitor upcoming, missed, failed, and recently paid and refunded transactions.
Gift Transactions
Use gift transactions to track donations that you receive as one-time gifts or as an installment to fulfill a commitment.
Gift Designations
Use gift designations to allocate incoming donations to specific funds.
Gift Entry and Processing
Enter gifts individually or add them to a gift batch. A gift batch uses a gift batch template that enables you to quickly create gift entries that have the same set of fields.
Manage Constituent Addresses
Constituents often have multiple addresses that they use at various times of the year. Track these addresses, or track only the constituent's historical addresses, so that you always send outreach materials and gift acknowledgments to the address in use by the constituent.
Gift Acknowledgments and Tax Receipts
Quickly and easily provide acknowledgments and tax receipts to your donors.
Gift and Donor Trends with Rollups
Use the Fundraising Philanthropy and Partnerships app to see metrics related to donor giving and gift designations at a glance.
Outreach Source Codes
Use outreach source codes to identify the outreach methods used with your campaigns to help determine which approaches are successful.
Scoring Frameworks Help Increase Fundraising Success
Scoring frameworks, like the Recency, Frequency, and Monetary value (RFM) score, help to identify the donors who are the best fit for each of your campaigns or outreach programs. Matching your donors to specific outreach endeavors improves your fundraising success and your relationships with your constituents.
Donor Profiles
The Donor Profile contains key information about your donors all in one place.
Copilot Actions: Fundraising Gift Proposals (Beta)
Streamline and expedite writing gift proposals with the help of Einstein Generative AI and Copilot. Learn how to set up and configure Einstein Copilot with Fundraising and get started drafting proposals.
Donor Support Profiles
The Donor Support Profile provides fast and personal support to your donors.
